header.title: THE PROGRAM
header.description: A holistic journey to your complete well-being in the unique universe of Dakhla

1.title: Arrival & Preparation
1.subtitle: Grounding & Opening
1.description: PA gentle start to your wellness getaway. Take the time to settle in, unwind, and reconnect with yourself‚Äîfar from the stress of everyday life.

2.title: Vitality & Sensory Relaxation
2.subtitle: Deep Letting Go
2.description: A day devoted to awakening the senses and revitalizing the body. Breathe, let go, and allow yourself to be carried by the soothing power of water and therapeutic care.
2.objective: Deep release, cellular oxygenation, muscle relaxation.

3.title: Regeneration & Balance
3.subtitle: Energy Recharge
3.description: Today is all about deep regeneration. Targeted treatments release built-up tension and rebalance your energy for complete relaxation.
3.objective: Boost circulation, refine silhouette, energy recharge.

4.title: Departure & Lasting Serenity
4.subtitle: Final Regeneration
4.description: Your retreat comes to an end, but the benefits linger. You leave with a clearer mind, a deeply relaxed body, and renewed inner balance.
4.objective: Toxin elimination, mental calm, regenerated skin.

items.question: What can I expect during these 3 days at Dakhla Club?
items.answer: You‚Äôll experience a true reconnection with yourself through a blend of relaxing treatments, sensory rituals, and a stunning natural setting between the desert and the ocean.

items.question: What types of treatments are included in the program?
items.answer: You‚Äôll enjoy a range of holistic therapies such as hydromassage baths, seaweed wraps, cupping therapy, and affusion massages ‚Äî all designed to deeply relax and recharge your body and mind.

items.question: Is this program suitable if I‚Äôve never done a spa or wellness retreat before?
items.answer: Absolutely ‚Äî it‚Äôs the perfect introduction, carefully designed to be gentle, welcoming, and fully guided by wellness professionals.

items.question: Why should I book quickly?
items.answer: Availability is limited to ensure a calm, personalized experience for every guest, so early booking is highly recommended.

items.question: Where will I stay during the retreat?
items.answer: You‚Äôll be staying right at the Dakhla Club Hotel & Spa, in a serene setting that perfectly complements and enhances the benefits of your treatments.

day1.label: Day 1
activities: Arrival at Dakhla Club: welcome, grounding tea, check-in to your bungalow. A gentle start in a pure natural setting.

day2.label: Day 2
activities: Dry sauna to begin toxin release
Heated thermal pool for joint and muscle relaxation
Himalayan salt scrub to stimulate lymphatic circulation
Salt detox massage for deep body cleansing

day3.label: Day 3
activities: Bol d‚ÄôAir Jacquier for cellular oxygenation
Jet shower to boost blood and lymph circulation
Hydromassage bath to release deep tension
Algae wrap for minerals, firmness, and radiance
Affusion massage for a total reset sensation

day4.label: Day 4
activities: Magnesium bath for muscle recovery and mental calm
Deep traditional massage for energetic alignment

day5.label: Day 5
activities: Cupping therapy + fire towel for deep energy and circulation

day7.label: Day 7
activities: Departure: closing ritual, take-home wellness journal.
